Description:
Detects modification of the registry settings used for Internet Explorer and other Windows components that use these settings. An attacker can abuse this registry key to add a domain to the trusted sites Zone or insert javascript for persistence

Author: frack113
Sigma Repository: [GitHub](https://github.com/SigmaHQ/sigma)
Name: Modification of IE Registry Settings
Query: sourcetype like 'windows-%' eql select * from _source_ where (target_object like '%\software\microsoft\windows\currentversion\internet settings%' and  not (details like 'dword%' or (details = 'cookie:' or details = 'visited:' or details = '(empty)') or (target_object like '%\cache%' or target_object like '%\zonemap%' or target_object like '%\wpaddecision%') or details = 'binary data' or target_object like '%\accepted documents\%'))
